item.title: Help us finding a logo
item.description: Dear users, help us finding a logo for drbdtop. Maybe a gopher juggling DRBD logos? A gopher from gopherize.me wearing a DRBD t-shirt? A gopher watching a monitor with the DRBD logo? Not a gopher at all? I (rck) am totally useless when it comes to graphics/design ;-) Thanks in advance.
